SEARCH
Package org.jlab.phaser.network

Class NettyJsonConsole

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.phaser.network.NettyJsonConsole
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResponseListener, PhaserServerConsole
public class NettyJsonConsole extends Object implements PhaserServerConsole, ResponseListener
An implementation of a PhaserServerConsole which leverages the Netty network library to do the heavy lifting.

This class also implements ResponseListener and should be registered as a response listener so that it can check for "ok" responses and returned data.

  • Method Details

    • cavities

      public LinkedHashSet<String> cavities() throws CommandException
      Description copied from interface: PhaserServerConsole
      Returns the set of all cavities which are eligible for phasing. The set is ordered alphabetically, which happens to also be S-coordinate order (distance from injector).
      Specified by:
      cavities in interface PhaserServerConsole
      Returns:
      The ordered set of cavities
      Throws:
      CommandException - If unable to obtain the set
